component.name: katimon
component.summary: ATI Graphics Card monitor and overclocking GUI.

description.p: katimon is an unofficial ATI graphics card temperature monitor, fan regulator, and overclocking utility which uses the aticonfig utility from the proprietary fglrx driver.

ul.li: Monitor temperature, fan speed, GPU speed and memory speed
Automatically control fan speed by monitoring the temperature
Overclocking utility for cards that support it
